kw.msg: ${apiResponse} = [{'reviewId': '4ff5865c-d334-401e-a57e-deb2ed86f1bc', 'rating': 4.0, 'content': {'comment': '10 min race is a bit too short. '}, 'comment': '10 min race is a bit too short. ', 'status': 'PUBLISHED', '...

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg:
[{'reviewId': '4ff5865c-d334-401e-a57e-deb2ed86f1bc', 'rating': 4.0, 'content': {'comment': '10 min race is a bit too short. '}, 'comment': '10 min race is a bit too short. ', 'status': 'PUBLISHED', 'activityDate': '2021-06-16T00:00:00', 'dateCreated': '2021-06-17T01:30:08.199759', 'travellerType': 'Family (with teens)', 'customer': {'firstName': 'Nancy', 'lastName': 'Ang', '__typename': 'ReviewCustomer'}, '__typename': 'Review'}, {'reviewId': 'd6cac3fd-d6d5-4528-b6f8-ee16437405f9', 'rating': 4.0, 'content': {'comment': 'The price from pelago was more expensive compared to buying on the spot.
The race was good, but it will be good to give all participants an online certificate, i had that when I visited go-kart in Australia, good memory. '}, 'comment': 'The price from pelago was more expensive compared to buying on the spot.
The race was good, but it will be good to give all participants an online certificate, i had that when I visited go-kart in Australia, good memory. ', 'status': 'PUBLISHED', 'activityDate': '2021-06-16T00:00:00', 'dateCreated': '2021-06-17T01:28:49.048385', 'travellerType': 'Family (with teens)', 'customer': {'firstName': 'Nancy', 'lastName': 'Ang', '__typename': 'ReviewCustomer'}, '__typename': 'Review'}, {'reviewId': 'a7d1c909-0f35-44c5-8adc-2c7bc9bed844', 'rating': 5.0, 'content': {'comment': 'Definitely worth going for the track experience and 50km/h karts (license needed, picture or actual card) Fun to race with your friends and family '}, 'comment': 'Definitely worth going for the track experience and 50km/h karts (license needed, picture or actual card) Fun to race with your friends and family ', 'status': 'PUBLISHED', 'activityDate': '2020-11-04T00:00:00', 'dateCreated': '2021-05-05T10:14:03.736982', 'travellerType': 'Group of Friends', 'customer': {'firstName': 'Karan', 'lastName': 'Bhalodiya', '__typename': 'ReviewCustomer'}, '__typename': 'Review'}, {'reviewId': '05f5f47a-bf78-47ee-b253-50c8672955f6', 'rating': 5.0, 'content': {'comment': 'I booked Fun Karting at Kranji through Pelago. The entire booking experience was seamless.
The activity itself was pretty fun and thrilling, so much so that my friends and I ended up buying one more racing session at the venue.

If not for Pelago, I wouldn't have realised that such a thing exists in Singapore. I will use their website again to explore what else they have to offer here in Singapore.

Highly recommended for a day out with friends and families !!!'}, 'comment': "I booked Fun Karting at Kranji through Pelago. The entire booking experience was seamless.
The activity itself was pretty fun and thrilling, so much so that my friends and I ended up buying one more racing session at the venue.

If not for Pelago, I wouldn't have realised that such a thing exists in Singapore. I will use their website again to explore what else they have to offer here in Singapore.

Highly recommended for a day out with friends and families !!!", 'status': 'PUBLISHED', 'activityDate': '2020-11-04T00:00:00', 'dateCreated': '2021-05-03T16:45:37.789941', 'travellerType': 'Group of Friends', 'customer': {'firstName': 'Vipin Pal', 'lastName': 'Singh', '__typename': 'ReviewCustomer'}, '__typename': 'Review'}, {'reviewId': '2cb69f9f-03e4-46c4-87b6-9ac99ff962ab', 'rating': 5.0, 'content': {'title': 'None', 'comment': "Booked the Advance karting for 5 of us then decided to go for Novice on d-day cos after looking other group who took Advance it was too fast & scary. Had the impression that 10 minutes would be too short for ~S$30 activity, but it was very satisfying! All of us LOVED it and wanted to go again. When we went it was raining which added to the fun, consider to bring change of clothes as we were soaking wet with gravel sticking to us after. If it's your first time, recommend to book the Novice kart."}, 'comment': "Booked the Advance karting for 5 of us then decided to go for Novice on d-day cos after looking other group who took Advance it was too fast & scary. Had the impression that 10 minutes would be too short for ~S$30 activity, but it was very satisfying! All of us LOVED it and wanted to go again. When we went it was raining which added to the fun, consider to bring change of clothes as we were soaking wet with gravel sticking to us after. If it's your first time, recommend to book the Novice kart.", 'status': 'PUBLISHED', 'activityDate': '2021-03-07T00:00:00', 'dateCreated': '2021-04-21T08:11:11.119969', 'travellerType': 'Group of Friends', 'customer': {'firstName': 'Kezia', 'lastName': 'Jenissa ', '__typename': 'ReviewCustomer'}, '__typename': 'Review'}]
